description: This recipe uses a cob loaf but the closest thing the bakery had was a vienna loaf which still works. Add whatever you like to it..
name: Fairy Bread Cob Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Decorate however you like. I served mine with dipped bread wedges, marshmallows, vanilla wafers and sour straps. Cut up strawberries look really good too.
